I am a postdoctoral fellow in the Department of Environmental and Occupational Health the Dornsife School of Public Health, Drexel University. I am an environmental epidemiologist with expertise in the role of ambient air pollution and social stress on clinical treatment efficacy among susceptible populations.

### Education

-   **PhD**, Environmental and Occupational Health
    -   Drexel University
-   **MPH**, Environmental Health Sciences
    -   Columbia University
-   **BSc**, Biology / Chemistry
    -   CUNY City College of New York
